title: Subject to the foregoing provision, only the actual occupants of the hutments shall be considered eligible, and the so-called structure owner other than the actual occupant if any, even if his name is shown in the electoral roll for the structure, shall have no right whatsoever to the reconstructed tenement against that structure
clause_text: Subject to the foregoing provision, only the actual occupants of the hutments shall be considered eligible, and the so-called structure owner other than the actual occupant if any, even if his name is shown in the electoral roll for the structure, shall have no right whatsoever to the reconstructed tenement against that structure.
